data.comment: Today's referee, Yudai Yamamoto, has blown to start the match.
Nagoya are caught offside.
In the minute 1, Yokohama Marinos take a 0-1 lead thanks to Junior Santos.
Teruhito Nakagawa with an assist there.
Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Nagoya.
Yudai Yamamoto awards the away team a throw-in.
In Nagoya a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Nagoya.
Yokohama Marinos needs to be cautious. Nagoya have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 6, Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a Nagoya throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half.
In the minute 9, Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
Yudai Yamamoto awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
Yokohama Marinos's Ken Matsubara misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 10, Goal kick for Nagoya at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 11, Free kick Yokohama Marinos.
Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mu Kanazaki for Nagoya is whistled offside.
In the minute 13, Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 14, Mu Kanazaki (Nagoya) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Il-kyu Park for Yokohama Marinos who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 17, Il-kyu Park is back on his feet again.
Nagoya are pushing forward but Mateus's finish is wide of the goal.
Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Throw-in Nagoya.
Nagoya's Hiroyuki Abe attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
Yokohama Marinosâ€™s Daizen Maeda is on his feet again at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 21, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Daizen Maeda.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
In Nagoya Nagoya's Mu Kanazaki is caught offside.
Goal! Nagoya go level at 1-1 through Gabriel Xavier in Nagoya.
In the minute 24, That's a fine assist from Mateus.
Throw-in for Nagoya close to the penalty box.
Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Nagoya.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
In the minute 29, Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Yudai Yamamoto awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 31, Ken Matsubara of Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nagoya.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 33, Gabriel Xavier of Nagoya smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Nagoya drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a Nagoya throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half.
In the minute 34, Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
Nagoya drive forward but Mu Kanazaki is judged offside.
In the minute 35, Yudai Yamamoto awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Nagoya at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 36, Nagoya's Mateus has run offside.
Goal kick for Nagoya at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Yokohama Marinos are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 40, Can Yokohama Marinos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nagoya's half?
In Nagoya a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Teruhito Nakagawa (Yokohama Marinos) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 41, Nagoya's Mateus is whistled for offside at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 43, In Nagoya Yokohama Marinos attack through Ken Matsubara. The finish is off target, however.
Yudai Yamamoto awards Nagoya a goal kick.
Yuki Saneto is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
At Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium the fourth official shows that 6 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick Nagoya.
Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Mu Kanazaki of Nagoya is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
In the minute 45, Ange Postecoglou (Yokohama Marinos) is making a first change, with Takahiro Ogihara replacing the possibly injured Yuki Saneto.
In the minute 45, Junior Santos (Yokohama Marinos) gets a yellow card.
Yudai Yamamoto has blown to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Nagoya.
In the minute 48, Teruhito Nakagawa for the away team is judged to be offside.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 52, Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Nagoya in Nagoya.
Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a throw-in for Yokohama Marinos, close to Nagoya's area.
In the minute 59, Yuki Soma is on a sub for Hiroyuki Abe for Nagoya.
Teruhito Nakagawa (Yokohama Marinos) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 61, Nagoya to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Nagoya's half.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
Yudai Yamamoto awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 63, The away team have replaced Daizen Maeda with Erik. This is the second substitution made today by Ange Postecoglou.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nagoya.
In the minute 64, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ange Postecoglou is making the team's third substitution at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium with Jun Amano replacing Ken Matsubara.
Yudai Yamamoto awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 65, Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Nagoya.
At Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium, Marcos Junior has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Yuki Soma for Nagoya has been booked by Yudai Yamamoto and receives a first yellow card.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Nagoya to check on Il-kyu Park, who is grimacing with pain.
Il-kyu Park has recovered and rejoins the match in Nagoya.
In the minute 70, Yokohama Marinos push upfield but Yudai Yamamoto quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
Nagoya's Mateus gets in a shot on goal at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 72, Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Mateus is on target to give Nagoya a 2-1 advantage.
Gabriel Xavier instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 75, Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Nagoya's half.
In the minute 76, It's a goal kick for the home team in Nagoya.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
In Nagoya, Oh Jae-suk of Nagoya is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 77, Yuki Soma of Nagoya is pulled up for offside.
Erik gets his shot on target but fails to score for Yokohama Marinos.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 80, Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Nagoya close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 83, Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Yudai Yamamoto awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 85, In Nagoya a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Gabriel Xavier (Nagoya) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Nagoya.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
Goal kick for Nagoya at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
In the minute 87, Nagoya make their second substitution with Ryogo Yamasaki replacing Gabriel Xavier.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, Theerathon Bunmathan is replacing Ryo Takano for the away team.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
The away team replace Teruhito Nakagawa with Eitaro Matsuda.
Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Nagoya.
Yokohama Marinos's Marcos Junior is on target but unsuccessful.
Nagoya's Joao Schmidt is back in action after a slight knock.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Throw-in Nagoya.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
That's full-time at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium. The final score is 2-1.
Joao Schmidt is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Shumpei Naruse is replacing Oh Jae-suk for Nagoya at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
The home team replace Takuji Yonemoto with Joao Schmidt.
